headline: VARIAN SS VACUUM CHAMBER BELL JAR AND FRAME
description: Vacuum Chamber   A great core system for a custom project  System sold AS IS

specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model Core System
Description SS 25.5" Diameter X 30" High Vacuum Chamber
Vacuum System None
Vacuum System None. Requires vacuum gate valve and pumping system.

Base plate pumping flange is 8" ANSI.
Other Information Bell Jar Chamber -- Stainless Steel
25.5" diameter x 26" high including collar
Water cooled
6"Collar with 2.75" and 4.5" conflat ports
(8) 2.75" CF ports in collar
(3) 4.5" CF ports in collar
(1) 2.75" CF port in chamber
(1) 4" viewing port in chamber
(1) 4.5" CF port on top of chamber

8" pumping port.
